response.original_title: 田中と呪物と怪談と　第３回　前編
response.overview: Toshiyuki Tanaka will bring several items selected from his collection of more than 100 haunted objects and explain them. The guest ghost storytellers will tell ghost stories based on the objects themselves, the stories associated with the objects, and keywords that appear in the commentary. The guests for the third installment are Koji Ueda and Yasuhiro Tomita, who are also active as a ghost unit "Kai-Kai Shonendan.
response.title: Tanaka to Jumonmono to Kaidan to Dai 3-kai Zenpen
